text: Catherine Lombard (born 8 October 1965, deceased) was a French freestyle skier. She won a gold medal in aerials at the FIS Freestyle World Ski Championships 1989 in Oberjoch. She also competed at the 1986 and 1991 world championships. She took part at the 1988 Winter Olympics in Calgary, where aerials was a demonstration event. == References == == External links == * Category:1965 births Category:Year of death missing Category:French female freestyle skiers
title: Catherine Lombard
